title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 30, 2020
description: It was on this day in 1431 that Joan of Arc was burned at the stake in Rouen, France at the age of 19. About 500 years later, she was canonized as a Catholic saint.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day in 1431 that Joan of Arc was burned at the stake in Rouen, France at the age of 19. About 500 years later, she was canonized as a Catholic saint.
